title: Елена и капитан
overview: Elena Pavlova has a successful life and it seems to her that she is fairly happy. Unexpected circumstances make her reassess her priorities. An encounter with a man, whose life she ruined unintentionally some time ago, a man, who has a right to hate her, turns out to be the most important meeting in Elena's life. This meeting brings her the only thing she missed in her life – love…
